summary: A grown man caught in the crossfire of his parents' 15-year divorce discovers he was unknowingly part of a study on divorced children and is enlisted in a follow-up years later, which wreaks new havoc on his family.
cast: Adam Scott|Richard Jenkins|Catherine O'Hara|Amy Poehler|Mary Elizabeth Winstead|Clark Duke|Ken Howard|Valerie Tian|Sarah Burns|Jessica Alba|Jane Lynch|Jamie Renell|Valerie Payton|Gavin Plunkett|Isabella Zentkovich|Vickie Eng|Vince Canlas|Mark Oliver|Todd Denson|Stephen Warner|Randy Cohlmia|Adam Pally|Brian Kurlander|Sarah Vowell|Steve Coulter|David Kronawitter|Leland L. Jones|Elyssa Brette Mactas|Semi Lee|Claire Bronson|Andrea Moore|Trevor Scott Standish|Ben Swayze|Frank Roberts|Gregory Bromfield|Greyson Chadwick|Michael H. Cole|Niki Davis|Michelle Flanagan-Helmeczy|J.J. Jones|Liana Loggins|Kacie Jo Marta Nickles|Keith Ratchek|Joel Rogers|Clay Sayre|Don Teems
keywords: divorce|children|reference to the importance of being earnest|knocking in a car window|necklace
title: Síndrome postdivorcio
